mapper.select: SELECT p.productNum, p.name productName, price, pp.imageFileName FROM product p JOIN productPic pp ON p.productNum = pp.productNum WHERE p.productNum=#{productNum} AND INSTR(pp.imageFileName,'main') > 0
SELECT md.num, cd.name, md.userId, md.mileage point, cd.email, cd.tel, md.addr FROM customerDetail cd JOIN memberDetail md ON cd.num = md.num WHERE md.num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO customer(num, membership) VALUES(#{num},0) INTO customerDetail(num, name, email, tel) VALUES(#{num}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}) SELECT * FROM dual

INSERT INTO request(requestNum, num, total, addr1, addr2, zip, tel, name, memo) VALUES(#{requestNum}, #{num}, #{total},#{deliverAddr1}, #{deliverAddr2}, #{deliverZip}, #{deliverTel}, #{deliverName}, #{memo})
INSERT INTO requestDetail(requestDetailNum,requestNum, productNum, productCount, productSum) VALUES(requestDetail_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{requestNum}, #{productNum},#{productCount}, #{productSum})
INSERT INTO payment(requestNum, payMethod, point, purchase) VALUES(#{requestNum}, #{payMethod}, #{point},#{purchase})
INSERT INTO refund(requestNum, refundAccount, bank) VALUES(#{requestNum}, #{refundAccount}, #{bank})
